title: India's power consumption grows nearly 9 pc to 1,099.90 billion units in April-November
description: India's power usage surged by around nine percent from April to November, reaching 1,099.90 billion units, indicating robust economic activity. Fiscal year 2022-23 saw 1,504.26 BU consumed, a notable rise from the previous year. Despite lower summer projections due to rain, peak demands hit record highs in June and September. Union Power Minister R K Singh highlighted a 50.8% demand increase from 2013-14 to 2022-23, crediting capacity additions for meeting this surge.
